Here are the files for the requested behavior:

File: `TodoListService.cs`
```C#
using System.Collections.Generic;

namespace TodoList.Blazor
{
    public class TodoListService
    {
        private List<string> todoItems = new List<string>();

        public List<string> GetTodoItems()
        {
            return todoItems;
        }

        public void AddTodoItem(string todoItem)
        {
            todoItems.Add(todoItem);
        }
    }
}
```
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/TodoListService.cs

File: `Index.razor`
```C#
@page "/"
@inject TodoListService todoListService

<h1>Todo Items</h1>
<ul>
    @foreach (var item in todoListService.GetTodoItems())
    {
        <li>@item</li>
    }
</ul>
```
=== END FILE: TodoList.Blazor/Index.razor

These files can be added to a dotnet 8.0 project in the `TodoList.Blazor` namespace.
